channel.title: Please help!
channel.description:
[s]Ok, whenever I use a command, or any other person uses a command, it automatically crashes them. Which is really annoying because I'm trying to populate my server, and everytime someone uses a command, they d/c, which makes them leave.
THIS IS THE ERROR IT GIVES
java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -2 at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at client.customCommand(client.java:14176) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:25731) at client.packetProcess(client.java:20425) at client.packetSending(client.java:20366) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:190) [/s]
NEVERMIND, I FIXED IT! I'm such a noob for not figuring it out earlier xDD

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @timmarus1 timmarus1
item.description:
@timmarus1 wrote:

[s]Ok, whenever I use a command, or any other person uses a command, it automatically crashes them. Which is really annoying because I’m trying to populate my server, and everytime someone uses a command, they d/c, which makes them leave.
